edu.ub.misionespacial.actors

Class AbstractActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ub.misionespacial.actors.AbstractActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor, Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arma, ForatNegre, Heroi, Oxigen, Soldat

    public abstract class AbstractActor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    Classe base per tota la resta d'actors. Subclasses poden extendre aquesta classe i beneficiar-se d'aquesta implementacio basica.
